extendedInfo.description: Comic Editor is a small editor for creating comics using camera.You can insert three types of objects:Vignette, Balloon and ClipArt.After comic is complete you can save and share it.Note:The application is compatible with the MEDIUM-HIGH hardware level devices that implements the standard Android.(Removed Samsung GT-S5360 because low level and not compatible device) (Tested on Samsung Galaxy 1/2/3 and Asus Transformer)Lite version roadmap-improve the sensitivity;-new ClipArt;-extend devices compatibility;-sharing quality improvement;Full version roadmap-improve the sensitivity;-new ClipArt;-extend devices compatibility;-new paint editor;-new filters for the camera;-sharing quality improvement;V 1.0-First releaseV 1.1-Italian support-Comic Templetes addedV 1.2-Camera Init bug fixedV 1.3-Share bug fixed-Resize after hold bug fixed-Best performance-Open image galleryV 1.4-Best menÃ¹ performance-New filters-New cliparts-Spanish language supportV 1.5- Apply filters and rotate images imported- Hold bug fixed- Added the choice of Font- Undo command on filters- Correct translation errorsV 1.5.2- Camera rgb bug fixedV 1.5.3- Gesture optimized- Color dialog bug fixedV 1.6.0- New Clip Art- Performance- New Gesture (Rotation)V 1.7.0- Border color- New type of Ballon- Zoom on PainterV 1.8.0-Text clip-PenV 1.9.0-New introV 2.0.3-ads amazon

reviews.title: Good for Beta app
reviews.comment: Still under development, but with good updates, allows you to create a comic strip using the camera and clipart.. good for tablet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Locks up both times i used it
reviews.author: Norman Brown
